dict.acceptation: 小屋，村舍；（农舍式的）小别墅；（郊外的）新式住宅，（大院内的）单幢住宅；乡下房子，小房子；

sent.orig: You ought to have wished for a pretty little cottage.
sent.trans: 你该要一所漂亮的小村舍。

sent.orig: She liked the old cottage; its quaintness was appealing.
sent.trans: 她喜欢那个老旧的小屋，其奇巧的风格很吸引人。

sent.orig: He was sitting on the doorstep of the cottage, carving a piece of wood.
sent.trans: 他坐在小屋门前的台阶上，正在雕刻一块木头。

sent.orig: And the daughter of Zion is a cottage a vineyard aa garden of a besieged city.
sent.trans: 8仅存锡安城（原文是女子），好象葡萄园的草棚，瓜田的茅屋，被围困的城邑。

sent.orig: The fire started in a cottage.
sent.trans: 火是从小木屋烧起来的。
